thread.title: Reading Fan Goes Viral After Valentines Day Twitter Complaint Backfires Horribly
thread.title_full: Reading Fan Goes Viral After Valentines Day Twitter Complaint Backfires Horribly

title: Reading Fan Goes Viral After Valentines Day Twitter Complaint Backfires Horribly
text:
Reading Fan Goes Viral After Valentines Day Twitter Complaint Backfires Horribly Mon Feb 13 2017 20:08:03   20:08:03 GMT+0000 (GMT) Jack Kenmare Jack Kenmare in football 
If you're getting grief from your better half about spending Valentine's Day with them instead of watching the mountain of football on TV, spare a thought for one particular Reading FC supporter. 
There's not only Champions League last-16 ties on the box, but English Championship fixtures too, and Jaap Stam's promotion-chasing side are hosting Brentford at the Madejski Stadium. 
The scheduling has caused some amount of aggro in one household, as this Tweet suggests: 
As you can see from the amount of interactions, Jonathan's sentiments have stirred the pot amongst football fans across the country - and, sadly for him, many of the responses aren't telling him well done: What an odd way to out yourself as an absolute fanny. https://t.co/3Smm4gH2gq
